body: This is not a bug, right? More of a feature request?
By the way, really cool stuff~

maybe I need a bit more context on this issue as well, especially below:

> Note: There should be an error on the most nested item, but it's cleared because root item clearErrors fires last (see console)

@bluebill1049  Thanks!  Here's the flow:

1. Click `Remove Condition`
2. Root Group has no children, error is on `query.items` for `minLength` via `useEffect`
3. Click `Add Group`
4. The new Group has no child, so an error is set on `query.items.0.items` via `useEffect`
5. Root Group now has at least on child, so `minLength` is removed via `useEffect` (due to mounting order) -- but this clears all nested errors within that path, including child `query.items.0.items`

My thought is that it could be considered a bug because it was unexpected for me.  But it could also be a feature request if that was intended.

I would think clear error could check to see if any props other than `{ type, types, message}` exist at the error path `query.items` -- if yes, then remove the error props `{ type, types, message }` -- otherwise the whole object can be removed / deleted from the error object

thanks, @ilovett :) at the moment `clearError` is very basic, it just gets the name of the field and clears the error. you may want to bake the logic inside your app at the moment and submit a separate feature request for adding functionality with `clearError`.

issue.title: fix #2730 clearError should only delete specific error not unset the entire node

repository.name: react-hook-form

body:
```
<input name="test.data" />
<input name="test.remove" />
```

if you run `clearErrors('test')` ‚ùå, shouldn't clear any error, because no input is found.

`clearErrors('test.data')` ‚úÖ
`clearErrors('test.remove')` ‚úÖ

issue.title: 6.8.x useFieldsArray + clearErrors not working

repository.name: react-hook-form
repository.description: üìã React Hooks for form state management and validation (Web + React Native)

issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
since 6.8.0 `clearErrors` called with array of fields stops working
works with 6.7.2

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-useform-template-forked-j4wqk?file=/src/index.js
2. Click on 'Step 1: fill error' button
3. Click on 'Step 2: reset error' button

**Codesandbox link (Required)**
https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-useform-template-forked-j4wqk?file=/src/index.js

**Expected behavior**
`field1` error should be cleared
